result.title: Bytecode 2015
result.content:
Greetings from Bytecode'15

Bytecode, a 5-hour long ACM ICPC style algorithm intensive online programming contest conducted by Pragyan NIT Trichy, is back this year with more exciting and challenging problems. The stage is set for you to compete against the greatest coders across the world. The contest will be conducted on Codechef and begins at 20:30 hours IST on 27th Feb 2015.

Registration is free and open to all. This is a team event and team may consist of a maximum of 3 members (not necessarily from the same institute).

Prize money of 1450 USD to be won!

Contest link : http://codechef.com/BYCD2015 . Register your team before the start of contest.

Have a look at the previous yearâ€™s challenges here: http://codechef.com/BTCD2014

For further details visit: http://pragyan.org or you could check out our Facebook page(http://www.facebook.com/pragyan.nitt) for regular updates.

Good Luck. Have fun

Regards, Team Bytecode. Pragyan 2015.
